Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • labyrinth.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enter, Exit, Keys, Monster, Player, Road, Wall

    public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents single drawable object of labyrinth.
